name: vanilla-cookbook
description: Vanilla Cookbook is a self-hosted recipe manager tailored for simple, ingredient-focused cooking. It lets users store, categorize, and browse recipes through a clean web interface.
features: Recipe storage: Store recipes with ingredients, instructions, and cooking notes.
Simple interface: Navigate a clean, minimalist interface focused on cooking essentials.
Ingredient focus: Organize recipes by key ingredients for easy meal planning.
Category system: Categorize recipes by type, cuisine, or custom categories.
Search functionality: Find recipes quickly using search by name or ingredients.
Recipe browsing: Browse your recipe collection with filtering and sorting options.
Mobile-friendly: Access recipes from kitchen tablets or phones with responsive design.
Image support: Add photos to recipes for visual reference while cooking.
Print-friendly: Print recipes in a clean format for offline use in the kitchen.
Privacy-focused: Keep all recipes on your own server without external dependencies.
Quick entry: Add new recipes easily with straightforward input forms.
Lightweight: Run with minimal resources suitable for personal or family use.
